page.title: 07Bewley Football Match
page.content: In 1966 a football match was played between Ellacombe School and Hayes Road School. The match was a draw. Nineteen years later the Bewley Cup final was replayed at Torquay United football ground on May 7th 1985. Two of the old schoolboys had to travel from abroad; Steve Willicott from New Zealand and Alan Savage from Kuwait. In 1966 the score was 2-2, the replay score was 2-1 to Hayes Road. Graham Browning scored Ellacombe's only goal. Ellacombe's goalkeeper was John Rosslee who is the uncle of Martin Smyth of 4E Ellacombe Primary School.
